original_text: When no bush of the field was yet in the land and no small plant of the field had yet sprung up—for the Lord God had not caused it to rain on the land, and there was no man to work the ground,
korean_text: 여호와 하나님이 땅에 비를 내리지 아니하셨고 땅을 갈 사람도 없었으므로 들에는 초목이 아직 없었고 밭에는 채소가 나지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: When no bush of the field was yet in the land
sentences.korean_translation: 들에 아무 덤불도 아직 없었을 때

sentences.original_text: and no small plant of the field had yet sprung up
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 들에 어떤 작은 식물도 아직 돋아나지 않았으니

sentences.original_text: for the Lord God had not caused it to rain on the land
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 하나님께서 땅에 비를 내리게 하지 않으셨고

sentences.original_text: and there was no man to work the ground
